intro:
There are two sides to every fairytale...
Experience the rest of the story with these expansive bonus materials for TAISHO x ALICE ALL IN ONE!
description:
TAISHO x ALICE ALL IN ONE introduced us to the topsy-turvy fairytale land of Looking-Glass World, where we encountered gender-flipped characters inspired by Cinderella, Red Riding Hood, and more, and unraveled their twisted tales!
Now, the fandisk TAISHO x ALICE: HEADS & TAILS gives the fans more to love on the Nintendo Switch™!
Discover previously untold tales of the Looking-Glass World!

Included Stories

Two tales that delve into the truth behind the main story.
Uncover the behind-the-scenes stories of Ryoushi and Woolfe from their own perspectives.

Ryoushi's Story
Hailing from a long line of doctors, Ryoushi Arisu lost his place in the family the moment his younger sister was born. Years later, at a med school far, far away, as he contemplates his career path... he meets the strange little boy who will change his life forever.

Woolfe's Story
It all started when he enrolled at a college in the town where his grandma lived. His motive: to search for an old friend who cut contact after a fight. But even after he found him, it still wasn't really HIM... This is the story of Woolfe's life in the friendzone, doing his best for his bestie!

Afterstories
These tales explore what happens to each of the seven characters after their happy endings.
After all the twists and turns it took for the couple to finally fall in love, watch as they enjoy a sweet moment.

Arisu Academy
An alternate universe that poses the question, "What if everyone were teachers and students?"
Circumstances at home have caused our heroine to transfer to Mirrorfield Academy. Prepare for a new school life where seven quirky, handsome guys await you in this romantic comedy!

Looking-Glass World's Biggest Sadist Tournament!
The Sadist Tournament has suddenly come to the Looking-Glass World! Once all the fruitless pleas are said and done, who will win the crown? 

Available in two languages!
The text can be set to English or Japanese. This includes in-game text, options, and the digital manual. Language settings can be changed at any time.
*Applies to Ver. 2.0.0 and later.
*Voices will be in Japanese.
*Some text appearing in images, end credits, etc. will still be displayed in Japanese.

Play using only the touch screen! Play with one hand!
Play in handheld mode with the Nintendo Switch Joy-Con™ controllers attached, or detach them and play with just the touch controls! While in tabletop mode or TV mode, everything can be controlled using only the Joy-Con (R), allowing you to play with only one hand!
Also available for the Nintendo Switch Lite. (A separate Joy-Con (R) is required to play with one hand.)

Cast
Ryoushi    VA: Tomohisa Hashizume
Woolfe    VA: Natsuki Hanae
Cinderella    VA: Daisuke Hirakawa
Red Riding Hood    VA: Tomoaki Maeno
Kaguya    VA: Toshiki Masuda
Gretel    VA: Takuya Eguchi
Snow White    VA: Shouta Aoi
Wizard    VA: Wataru Hatano
Alice    VA: Yoshitsugu Matsuoka
Mother    VA: Yu Shimamura
Other
*Fully voiced (excluding the main character)

*English display only available on Version 2.0.0 and higher.
*"大正×対称アリス HEADS & TAILS" and "TAISHO x ALICE: HEADS & TAILS" are the same game.
